model.name: templatedRoute
model.title: Templated Route
model.description: Defines a templated route (a route built from a route template)
model.label: configuration

routeTemplateRef.description: Sets the id of the route template to use to build the route.

routeId.description: Sets the id of the route built from the route template.

prefixId.description: Sets a prefix to use for all node ids (not route id).

parameter.description: Adds an input parameter of the template to build the route

bean.description: Adds a local bean as input of the template to build the route
